Literature.Title: Alanine scan and (2)H NMR analysis of the membrane-active peptide BP100 point to a distinct carpet mechanism of action.
Literature.Author: Zamora-Carreras H, Strandberg E, Mühlhäuser P, Bürck J, Wadhwani P, Jiménez MA, Bruix M, Ulrich AS

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:1% Hemolysis=1.25 µM,Human erythrocytes:3% Hemolysis=2.5-5 µM,Human erythrocytes:5% Hemolysis=10 µM,Human erythrocytes:7% Hemolysis=20-160 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli DSM 1103(MIC=20µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa DSM 1117(MIC=40µM),Staphylococcus aureus DSM 1104(MIC=>160µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis DSM 1798(MIC=160µM)
